Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is seen as a form of government censorship.
The bill offers no benefit to the public good.
Freedom of speech is a fundamental human right that should be protected.
Conversation, research, and debate are preferred methods to counter disinformation.
Censorship is considered a worse alternative to disinformation.
Notable Quotes: No benefit whatsoever. Please scrap this bill immediately.
Freedom of speech is a fundamental human right and even though I agree that some disinformation can be problematic, the alternative of censorship is much worse.
